TextLibrary.Text: This is far enough. I lost my Dragon. I'll not lose another friend.
This is far enough. I lost my Dragon. I'll not lose another friend.
This is far enough. I lost my Dragon. I'll not lose another friend.
This is far enough. I lost my Dragon. I'll not lose another friend.
Elistara, we're almost there. The power is within my reach.
Elistara, we're almost there. The power is within my reach.
Elistara, we're almost there. The power is within my reach.
Elistara, we're almost there. The power is within my reach.
If this power was necessary to defeat Lord Bane, then why is he telling you about it? No, if you go any farther, I'm not going with you.
